transcript:
Customer: Hello hello.
Executive: Hello, hello.
Customer: Haan ji. 
Executive: Keh raha tha good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Vimal bol raha hu sir India Mart se.
Customer: Ji ha ji.
Executive: Ji ji bol raha hu sir office pahuch gaye aap sir?
Customer: Nahi pahucha nahi ji abhi mai.
Executive: Kitne time pahuch jayenge aap?
Customer: Abhi aadha ghanta.
Executive: Achcha achcha mai aadha ghante me lagata hu ek baar system pe ek baar aaiye na system pe ek baar connect kar lete hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive inquired if customer reached office.



Resolution:

- Executive will call in half an hour.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after 30 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, connect, office
